original_text: For whatever boasts I made to him about you, I was not put to shame. But just as everything we said to you was true, so also our boasting before Titus has proved true.
korean_text: 내가 그에게 너희를 위하여 자랑한 것이 있더라도 부끄럽지 아니하니 우리가 너희에게 이른 말이 다 참된 것 같이 디도 앞에서 우리가 자랑한 것도 참되게 되었도다

sentences.original_text: For whatever boasts I made to him about you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그에게 너희에 대해 자랑했던 것은

just as everything we said to you was true,
